OpportunityID.title: OpportunityID
OpportunityID.description: This is the Opportunity record ID needed to create a new business quote.

PriceBookName.title: PriceBookName
PriceBookName.description: The name of the pricebook. If left blank, will default to the standard pricebook, so this is an optional input.

QuoteName.title: QuoteName
QuoteName.description: This is an optional input for the user to specify the quote's name. It can be ignored if the user hasn't specified a quote name explicitly.
